name: Beware of the Wolves
description:
In the deep forest full of dangerous wolves, we play mostly as a little girl who is desperate to get back to her father, with only a slingshot to help her.

While playing as the daughter stealth to pass through the wolves, and later as the lumberjack, kill them with your axe to save her at the end.

Features:

- Run and hide through the forest.
- Distract the wolves with your slingshot.
- Beware of your surrounding.
- Find your path home.
- Don't get caught.

Assets Used:
Environment | Girl/Player Character  | Wolves |  Beehive | Slingshot | Toolbox| Treehouse | Miscellaneous | Bed | Door | Window | Shelf | Rabbit hole |

Team:
